pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequential Method for Classification and Generalized Estimating Equations Problem // Sequential method to solve the the binary classification problem by Wang (2013) doi:10.1007/s00184-012-0426-4, multi-class classification problem by Li (2020) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2020.106911 and the highly stratified multiple-response problem by Chen (2019) doi:10.1111/biom.13160.
